description: Macro cradle that downloads and runs an .exe

customAttributes.name: downloadedFrom
customAttributes.description: The URL where the executable will downloaded from.

customAttributes.name: downloadedAs
customAttributes.description: The filename the downloaded executable will be saved as.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the powershell file to be created, can be full path or just a name

compilationAttributes.name: wordDocOut
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the word doc file to be created by the powershell script.

runHint: If wordDocOut is relative it it'll end up in the current users documents folder.
